Privacy Policy for RaceCentral

Last Updated: October 2023

1. Introduction
At RaceCentral, we value your privacy. This privacy policy describes how we use and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

2. Microsoft Clarity
We use Microsoft Clarity to analyze website usage. Microsoft Clarity collects anonymous and aggregated data to help us understand user engagement and improve our site's functionality. No personally identifiable information is collected or stored.

3. Data Collection
We do not collect, store, or share any personal data. The data gathered by Microsoft Clarity is solely for aggregate analysis and website improvement.

4. Contact
If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please contact us at security@racecentral.info.

By using our website, you agree to the terms outlined in this privacy policy.
